title: If the lands for industrial units are acquired under the provisions of part VII of the land acquisition Act 1894, then prior permission of the Government is necessary before permitting residential / commercial use in such lands and additional terms and conditions mentioned in Revenue Department, G
clause_text: If the lands for industrial units are acquired under the provisions of part VII of the land acquisition Act 1894, then prior permission of the Government is necessary before permitting residential / commercial use in such lands and additional terms and conditions mentioned in Revenue Department, G.R. No. MISC-01/2017/C.R.11/A-2, Dated. 11/01/2018 shall be applicable.
section: Conversion of Industrial Zone to Residential or Commercial Zone for the Uses permissible in Residential or Commercial Zone
